articles.description: A lot has changed since WWE 2K20 - FORTY NINE playable characters will be missing.
articles.content: WWE 2K20 boasted a whopping 266 characters (including variations of the same worker). Of those, 259 were fully playable in matches, which is pretty insane when one stops to think about it. However, b… [+1832 chars]

articles.title: GTA 6 full map potentially leaked with Vice City locations and activities - Dexerto
articles.description: New GTA 6 footage has leaked, potentially revealing in-game Vice City map locations, activities, services and more.
articles.content:
Leaked footage of GTA 6 has potentially surfaced online purporting to reveal the entire map of Vice City, menu locations, and more.
